mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DR_CHAT_SESSION(USER_NUMBER, SESSION_TITLE, CREATE_DATE) -- CREATE_DATE는 DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 가정 VALUES (#{userNumber}, #{sessionTitle}, NOW()) -- 명시적으로 NOW() 추가 또는 DEFAULT 값 활용
mapper.select: SELECT SESSION_NUMBER FROM DR_CHAT_SESSION WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 1 -- ROWNUM = 1 대신 LIMIT 1 사용
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DR_CHAT(USER_MSG, SESSION_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, CHAT_TIME) -- CHAT_TIME은 DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 가정 VALUES (#{userMsg}, #{sessionNumber}, #{userNumber}, NOW()) -- 명시적으로 NOW() 추가 또는 DEFAULT 값 활용

INSERT INTO DR_CHAT(BOT_REPLY, SESSION_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, CHAT_TIME) -- CHAT_TIME은 DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 가정 VALUES (#{botReply}, #{sessionNumber}, #{userNumber}, NOW()) -- 명시적으로 NOW() 추가 또는 DEFAULT 값 활용
mapper.select: SELECT SESSION_NUMBER, SESSION_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM DR_CHAT_SESSION WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} ORDER BY SESSION_NUMBER DESC

SELECT C.SESSION_NUMBER, C.USER_MSG ,C.BOT_REPLY, C.CHAT_TIME -- CHAT_TIME 추가 (정렬 및 표시용) FROM DR_CHAT_SESSION CS JOIN DR_CHAT C ON CS.SESSION_NUMBER = C.SESSION_NUMBER WHERE C.SESSION_NUMBER = #{sessionNumber} ORDER BY C.CHAT_NUMBER ASC -- 또는 C.CHAT_TIME ASC
